name: Black Forest Mart
description:
What seems to be a normal Supermarket during the day, changes into something else at night. No one seems to be covering this case, but our player is sent to investigate the claims made by the town's residents. 

As an Investigator, the player will spend the night at the Supermarket. They will have to find clues, solve puzzles, and explore the strange environment. 

Will you be able to discover the cause of these strange occurrences and escape?
